root.name: Game Tengoku
root.description: Level 1 The arcade comes home... literally. Taking a page from Konami's Parodius playbook, Jaleco delivers a shooter with a sense of humor. Game Tengoku, a.k.a. Game Paradise, flies you through the world of Japanese arcades while blowing up a variety of game related enemies. Stages flick between an 8-bit invasion to an assault on a karoke bar. It's otaku overload!
